mapper.insert: insert into category_table(category_name, category_father_id, category_level, category_weight, category_tip, category_tip_show, create_time, update_time) VALUES (#{categoryName},#{categoryFatherId},#{categoryLevel},#{categoryWeight},#{categoryTip},#{categoryTipShow},#{createTime},#{updateTime})
mapper.update: update category_table set category_name = #{categoryName}, category_father_id = #{categoryFatherId}, category_level = #{categoryLevel}, category_weight = #{categoryWeight}, category_tip = #{categoryTip}, category_tip_show = #{categoryTipShow}, update_time = #{updateTime} where id = #{id}
